keyMappings:
unmapAll

map <c-End> previousTab
map <c-Insert> LinkHints.activateMode

# Navigation

map e scrollDown
map . scrollUp
map E scrollToBottom
map > scrollToTop

map r reload
map c copyCurrentUrl
map C openCopiedUrlInNewTab

map u LinkHints.activateMode
map U LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab

# Vomnibar

map h Vomnibar.activate
map H Vomnibar.activateInNewTab

map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

map p Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map P Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

# Find

map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

# Tabs

map d removeTab
map D restoreTab
map + duplicateTab

map ' previousTab
map " firstTab
map , nextTab
map < lastTab

# Misc

map ? showHelp
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
